title: Commercial Property in prime location
details:
11 Perches on Walukarama road (Between Galle Road & Duplication Road);
Ideal for commercial use;
Wide road frontage of over 50 feet;
Wide road with ample parking;
Bordering Astoria luxury apartments;
Fast developing area with a number of new high rise buildings on the same road;
Easy access to Galle road and Duplication Road
